2 qml file manipulation We should look to see what the qml files look like so we can manipulate them with data like comments downloaded from bcdata and from custom csv files that could hold the info we want to turn into forms. Let’s try loading one with only the form exported and inspect. my_data <- read.delim("data/survey_form_only.qml") my_data %>% fpr::fpr_kable() Table 2.1:
